main_title: When the U.S. Army Fought a Sea Monster in 1798
hook: [curious] In 1798, a Massachusetts town faced a terrifying enemy: a gigantic sea serpent! Residents of Gloucester reported sightings of a 100-foot-long creature lurking off their coast.
description: In 1798, a sea serpent sparked a military mobilization in Gloucester! What did they really see? #SeaSerpent #HistoryMystery #Gloucester
